tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE oil_spills (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  spill_date DATE,
  spill_volume DECIMAL(10,2),
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  oil_spill_id INT,
  species_id INT,
  impact_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (oil_spill_id) REFERENCES OilSpills(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES MarineSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_team_id INT,
  oil_spill_id INT,
  marine_life_id INT,
  water_quality_id INT
);
